entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
